about_the_game:
Nekopirate is a story driven action-platformer featuring short challenging levels, colorful graphics and a heartfelt story.



Nina is a nekopirate and the daughter of legendary pirate Bartholomeow Williams. When her father falls ill it is up to Nina to find a cure. But her quest will soon prove to be more challenging than expected, when the only known cure for his illness is a mystical flower known as Lágrima de la Luna.



Explore the Caribbean Sea, Run inside a volcano, find love in an underwater Mermaid City, defeat a giant Rubber Duck, all while trying to escape an island where everything is trying to kill you.



Features:
- Over 40 hand-crafted levels
- 4 different pirate-themed locations
- Fast-paced platforming gameplay
- Unlockable weapons
- Tons of collectables and side quests
- Beautiful artwork
- Giant bosses and mini games
- A funny and emotional story about love and determination

Nekopirate is a story driven action-platformer featuring short challenging levels, colorful graphics and a heartfelt story.



Nina is a nekopirate and the daughter of legendary pirate Bartholomeow Williams. When her father falls ill it is up to Nina to find a cure. But her quest will soon prove to be more challenging than expected, when the only known cure for his illness is a mystical flower known as Lágrima de la Luna.



Explore the Caribbean Sea, Run inside a volcano, find love in an underwater Mermaid City, defeat a giant Rubber Duck, all while trying to escape an island where everything is trying to kill you.



Features:
- Over 40 hand-crafted levels

name: Nekopirate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (32/64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Atom Cherry Trail Z8700 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 integrated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard (Xbox 360 Controller Highly Recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/nVidia DirectX 9.0 dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard (Xbox 360 Controller Highly Recommended)

short_description: Nekopirate is a story driven action-platformer featuring short challenging levels, colorful graphics and a twisted sense of humor.
